headline: The Democratic Convention Kicks Off
description: The Democratic National Convention will open in Chicago with President Biden passing the torch to Kamala Harris as the Democratic nominee.
newsletter_sub_hed: Plus, a push for a Gaza cease-fire. Here’s the latest at the end of Monday.

headline: Israel agreed to a proposal on a cease-fire
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has accepted a 'bridging proposal' for a cease-fire with Hamas in Gaza, according to Secretary of State Antony Blinken.

headline: Ukraine aimed to entrap Russian troops
description: Russian troops in the Kursk region near the Ukraine border may become encircled after Ukraine's recent bombing of strategic bridges, complicating Russia's military situation.

headline: George Santos pleaded guilty
description: George Santos, the former Republican congressman from New York, pleaded guilty to wire fraud and aggravated identity theft, avoiding a trial and agreeing to pay restitution.

headline: Remembering Phil Donahue
description: Phil Donahue, the unchallenged king of daytime talk television, died at 88, known for innovative audience participation in 'The Phil Donahue Show.'

headline: Scuba diving with grandma
description: Many older adults are joining their grandchildren on travel adventures, enjoying longer 'healthspans' and participating in activities like wilderness hikes, bike tours, and even bungee jumping.

headline: Confessions of a hate-watcher
